text: Secret Places is a 1984 British drama movie directed by Zelda Barron and based on the novel by Janice Elliott. It stars Marie Theres Relin, Tara MacGowran, Claudine Auger, Jenny Agutter, Pippa Hinchley, Rosemary Martin, Margaret Lacey and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1984 drama movies Category:1984 LGBT movies Category:British drama movies Category:British LGBT movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: Secret Places (movie)
